Articles.Content:
Boris became afraid. He expects the safety inspector to appear before dark. The Doctor thought that massive rollers might counter the lack of punters and dockers on Kerbin. The mission would gradually devolve into wheels, something revolutionary to Kerbalkind. How extraordinary that is, considering the effort required to make big ol' pitch forks and feather dusters with large torches, and wiggly tentacles playing the piano for fun.
